name: The Wastelander
raw_snippet: The Wastelander Motorcycle A heavy duty rough terrain vehicle with a large storage area built into the back end. Vehicle Type: Motorcycle Crew: One rider. Maximum Speed: 120 mph (192 km) Black Market Cost: 24,000 credits gasoline engine or 28,000 credits Engine: Combustion or electric engine. for electric. Often comes with a sun roof and standard laser rifle Maximum Range: 400 miles (480 km) attached to the roof; 360 degree rotation and 90 degree arc of fire. Add cost of rifle to vehicle. Length: 9 feet (2.7 m) Weight: 800 lbs (360 kg) M.D.C. by Location: Tires (2) — 1 each Main Body — 45 Black Market Cost: 18,000 credits gasoline engine or 21,000 credits for electric. Add 4000 for machinegun and 11,000 for laser. Weapons: None
